hero.subtitle: The best stories start with a problem. Ours did, too.

start.heading: It all started in 2020.
start.p1: Our founder was tired of one-size-fits-all solutions that ignored real needs. It was time to build something better.
start.p2: If one product can't serve everyone, we create a flexible approach that adapts to each person.
start.p3: With more determination than hours of sleep, we chose to invent what didn't exist yet.

2020.title: The idea is born
2020.text: 15 months of research and testing, and dozens of prototypes, to craft the right solution.

2022.title: First milestones
2022.text: International recognition and innovation awards. Our solution becomes a benchmark.

2024.title: European expansion
2024.text: We entered France with a local team determined to reinvent the customer experience.

values.heading: Our values
values.subtitle: What guides us every day as we build exceptional solutions.

passion.title: Passion
passion.text: We put our heart into every project because excellence starts with passion.

quality.title: Quality

proximity.title: Customer closeness
proximity.text: We build genuine relationships based on trust and active listening.

european.title: European craftsmanship
european.text: All our products are made in Europe with carefully selected partners who share our standards.

fairPrices.title: Fair prices
